name: Post Editor for Google+™
tagline: Provide simple formatting assistance for Google+™.
body:
### Post Editor for Google+™
Post Editor is a Chrome Extension for Google+™ that adds formatting buttons to the bottom of the post box so you can easily style your posts. So if you find it hard to remember how to make things bold on Google+ or how to make them Italic, the extension can help!

![Post Editor for Google+](http://i2.wp.com/images.paulspoerry.com/2014/03/screenshot_highlight.png?resize=500%2C289)

### Download
Download the Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store: http://goo.gl/ywkWj3

### Authors and Contributors
2014 Paul Spoerry (@paulspoerry)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Submit an issue: https://github.com/PaulSpoerry/PostEditorForGooglePlus/issues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
